quest.name: Bloomin' Ocean
journal:
Maru hopes you will be amenable to acquiring anemones.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Deliver the redbloom anemones to Maru.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Forename, would you be willin' to go scrape me up some redbloom anemones? There's this recipe I wanna try...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: You'll wanna look just off the coast of Saltwind's Welcome. If you could grab me a couple growin' close to the water's surface, I'd be much obliged.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: These're them! Redblooms are universal─fishers use 'em for moochin', and they're delicious deep-fried or steamed in coconut milk. With fronds like these, who needs other anemones?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: ...A-Anyway, since they're so popular, you're only allowed to harvest 'em from certain areas. Don't wanna get too greedy, after all...
